name: Gunlock (itch)
description:
YOU ARE YOUR GUN!

Gunlock is a fast-paced dungeon crawler game. You play as a failed experiment that is biologically attached to his gun. This means whenever you run out of HP or Ammo you will DIE.

Gunlock features multiple enemy types that reacted uniquely with certain ammo types. This forces fast-paced ammo management and decision-making.  You will need to conserve your ammo, not only because it keeps you alive, but also because it will be necessary to defeat your final foe.

Devs

Gunlock was made by two high school students as their first-ever game! It was a great learning experience despite the long hours and countless errors that we encountered. We hope you enjoy Gunlock and you will see more from us in the future!
